Class ElectionType

java.lang.Object
ElectionType
Direct Known Subclasses:
MPOElection, OPLElection
public abstract class ElectionType extends Object
The abstract class ElectionType serves as a blueprint for the two election types: IR and OPL. It encapsulates shared data and operations for handling election processes.

    • createCandidateList

      protected ArrayList<Candidate> createCandidateList(String candidateEntries)
      Creates a list of Candidate objects based on a string of candidate entries.
      Parameters:
      candidateEntries - A string representation of candidates and their parties.
      Returns:
      A list of Candidate objects.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If candidate entries are null or improperly formatted.

    • tieBreaker

      protected Object tieBreaker(ArrayList<?> objects)
      Selects a candidate randomly from a list to break a tie.
      Parameters:
      objects - List of candidates among whom the tie is to be broken.
      Returns:
      The selected candidate object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the list is null or empty.
